Backup.txt
MID_BACKUP_NOT_FOUND	Unable to access save data.\nPlease turn the power off and try again.
MID_BACKUP_NOT_FORMATTED	The game must be initialized\nbefore you can begin.
MID_BACKUP_VERIFICATION_FAILED	Corrupted save data has been found.\nThe corrupted data will be deleted.
MID_BACKUP_NOT_ENOUGH_SPACE	There is not enough free space\nto create save data.
MID_BACKUP_FORMAT	Initializing...\nPlease do not turn off the power.
MID_BACKUP_VERIFICATION_FAILED_FILE	Deleting corrupted save data...\nPlease do not turn off the power.
MID_BACKUP_FORMAT_COMPLETE	Initialization complete.
MID_BACKUP_EXT_MEDIA_NOT_FOUND	Could not detect an SD Card.
MID_BACKUP_EXT_OPERATION_DENIED	A problem occurred with the\nSD Card. Please turn the power off,\nreinsert the SD Card, and try again.
MID_BACKUP_EXT_VERIFICATION_FAILED	Corrupted save data has been found.\nThe corrupted data will be deleted.
MID_BACKUP_EXT_VERIFICATION_FAILED2	Corrupted save data has been found.\nThis data will be repaired.
MID_BACKUP_EXT_NOT_ENOUGH_SPACE	There is not enough free space\non the SD Card.
MID_BACKUP_EXT_WRITE_PROTECT	Write-protection is enabled on the\nSD Card. Please turn off the power,\nmove the SD Card's write-protection\nswitch to the unlocked position,\nand then try again.

MID_CONFIG_オン	On

MID_H_CONFIG_戦闘アニメ_オン	Show all combat animations.
MID_H_CONFIG_戦闘アニメ_人間ユニット	Only show animations involving your units.
MID_H_CONFIG_戦闘アニメ_人間ターン	Only show animations during your turn.

MID_H_CONFIG_ＡＩ_オン	Skip actions for units you don't control.

MID_H_CONFIG_命令継続_オン	Tactics remain in effect across multiple turns.
MID_H_CONFIG_命令継続_手動	Tactics must be confirmed at the start of each turn.

MID_H_CONFIG_スライドパッド_デジタル	Limit the cursor to rigid, precise movement.

MID_CONFIG_オートカーソル_オフ	On
MID_CONFIG_オートカーソル_オン	Off

MID_H_CONFIG_オートカーソル_オン	Start each turn with the cursor on your leader.

MID_CONFIG_オートターンエンド_オフ	Off
MID_CONFIG_オートターンエンド_オン	On

MID_H_CONFIG_オートターンエンド_オン	Turn ends after all your units have taken action.

MID_H_CONFIG_反転_オン	The camera will move opposite the direction pressed.

MID_GMAP_COMMENT_ラムの林	A rich, verdant forest.\nA narrow path within\nleads to Ram Village.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_盗賊の森	This gloomy wood\nhas been prowled by\nbrigands recently,\nmaking travel along\nits roads rather risky.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_盗賊のほこら	A natural cavern built\ninto a shrine to the\ngoddess Mila. Lately,\nit's become a popular\nhangout for thieves\nand ruffians.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_ラムの谷	Narrow paths climb\nsteep slopes across\nthis naturally formed\ngateway dividing the\nSouth Zofia Plains\nfrom Zofia's southern\nextreme.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_南の砦	An old fortress built\nto defend Zofia's\nsouth in times of war.\nThough small in scale,\nits bare construction\nis extremely effective.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_南の砦内部	An old fortress built\nto defend Zofia's\nsouth in times of war.\nThough small in scale,\nits bare construction\nis extremely effective.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_ソフィアの南１	The southern end of\nthe vast South Zofia\nPlains. A long road to\nZofia Castle winds\nthrough its emerald\nhills.
MID_GMAP_COMMENT_ソフィアの南２	The northern end of\nthe vast South Zofia\nPlains. The road to\nZofia Castle cuts\nacross its grassy\nexpanses.

Poem.txt
MID_盗賊のほこら_アルム_00	The dank smell of mold permeates the shrine.
MID_盗賊のほこら_アルム_01	It's foul, like the rogues who crawl about the place.
MID_盗賊のほこら_アルム_02	How could this house to the Mother have\nbecome such a welcome haven for brigands?
MID_盗賊のほこら_アルム_03	How could this house to the Mother have\nbecome such a welcome haven for brigands?
MID_盗賊のほこら_アルム_04	How could this house to the Mother have\nbecome such a welcome haven for brigands?
MID_解放軍のアジト_アルム_00	These sprawling catacombs were built as a resting\nplace for Zofia's most distinguished families.
MID_解放軍のアジト_アルム_01	These sprawling catacombs were built as a resting\nplace for Zofia's most distinguished families.
MID_解放軍のアジト_アルム_02	But now their halls are clogged with the stench of the\ndead—rotten corpses who have risen again as Terrors.
MID_解放軍のアジト_アルム_03	But now their halls are clogged with the stench of the\ndead—rotten corpses who have risen again as Terrors.
MID_海のほこら_セリカ_00	The damp, chilly air of the cave\nbears the scent of the ocean.
MID_海のほこら_セリカ_01	There's no sign of anyone coming through here;\nscared off by the Necrodragon, I imagine.
MID_海のほこら_セリカ_02	There's no sign of anyone coming through here;\nscared off by the Necrodragon, I imagine.
MID_森のほこら_アルム_00	Just imagine how many generations\nthese massive ruins have stood witness to.
MID_森のほこら_アルム_01	Just imagine how many generations\nthese massive ruins have stood witness to.
MID_森のほこら_アルム_02	The dusty air carries more than\nthe scent of broken, rusty iron;
MID_森のほこら_アルム_03	it's like I'm breathing in centuries of history.
MID_森のほこら_アルム_04	And yet, I can see the signs of men of ill intent having\ncome and gone with no regard for the place at all.
MID_森のほこら_アルム_05	And yet, I can see the signs of men of ill intent having\ncome and gone with no regard for the place at all.
MID_竜のほこら_セリカ_00	What a strange place... Clean, but in the sort of way\nthat comes from being devoid of all life. Hostile to it.
MID_竜のほこら_セリカ_01	What a strange place... Clean, but in the sort of way\nthat comes from being devoid of all life. Hostile to it.
MID_竜のほこら_セリカ_02	That sound in the distance... Waves against a shore?
MID_竜のほこら_セリカ_03	I remember as a child hearing\nit said that somewhere in Zofia
MID_竜のほこら_セリカ_04	a sea spans the gap between\nthe living world and the dead.
MID_竜のほこら_セリカ_05	a sea spans the gap between\nthe living world and the dead.

MID_恐山のほこら_アルム_01	The voices of the dead, perhaps, calling from\nthe land beyond, hungry again for life.
MID_恐山のほこら_アルム_02	Valentia knows no deeper pit than this,\nthe guts of Fear Mountain.

MID_秘密のほこら_アルム_02	Why was it made? And to what end?

MID_迷いの森_セリカ_02	The tall stone pillars stand as sentinels,\nkeeping watch over our intrusion.

MID_ドーマの塔_セリカ_02	Perhaps that answer lies at the tower's peak.

Tutorial.txt
MID_TT_アルム	$t0$Wmアルム|0$w0|$Wsアルム|$Wa$SvpV_TT_ARUM_00|...Huh? The Turnwheel is glowing!$k
MID_TT_セリカ	$t0$Wmセリカ|0$w0|$Wsセリカ|$Wa$SvpV_TT_CELLICA_00|Oh!$k$p$SvpV_TT_CELLICA_01|Mila's Turnwheel is glowing...\nWhat could it mean?$k
MID_指南_閉じる	START	Close
MID_指南_説明書	Manual
MID_指南_説明書確認	View the instruction manual?
MTUTID_ユニットをつかむ	Selecting Units
MTUTID_H_ユニットをつかむ_00	Place the cursor on the desired unit\nand press the A Button.
MTUTID_ユニットの移動	Moving Units
MTUTID_H_ユニットの移動_00	Choose a destination from among the blue\nspaces and press the A Button.
MTUTID_システムメニュー	System Menu
MTUTID_H_システムメニュー_00	To open the system menu, place the cursor\non an empty space and press the A Button.\nSelect "End" from the system menu to end\nyour phase and begin the enemy's turn.
MTUTID_地形効果	Terrain Effects
MTUTID_H_地形効果_00	When fighting on terrain such as forests,\nenemy attacks become easier to evade.
MTUTID_成長	Unit Growth
MTUTID_H_成長_00	Place your strongest units on the front lines\nand then use weaker units to finish off foes.
MTUTID_H_成長_01	Units grow by gaining experience points,\nso try to make use of this strategy to\nbuild a balanced, effective army.
MTUTID_危険範囲	Danger Area
MTUTID_H_危険範囲_00	Press the X Button to display the enemy's\nrange of action. Be sure to monitor your\ndistance to the enemy at all times.
MTUTID_進軍	Advancing
MTUTID_H_進軍_00	Place the cursor on Alm and press the\nA Button.
MTUTID_H_進軍_01	Use the +Control Pad to move about,\nor the A Button to enter structures.
MTUTID_射程	Attack Range
MTUTID_H_射程_00	Archers can attack over long distances,\nso take care when approaching them.
MTUTID_ダンジョン	Dungeons
MTUTID_H_ダンジョン_00	In dungeons, you take control of Alm\nand explore environments freely.
MTUTID_H_ダンジョン_01	If you make contact with an enemy,\ncombat will ensue.
MTUTID_H_ダンジョン_02	If at any point a dungeon seems too\ndangerous, select "Evacuate" from\nthe menu to exit the dungeon.
MTUTID_疲労	Fatigue
MTUTID_H_疲労_00	Fatigue will gradually set in as you fight\nyour way through a dungeon.
MTUTID_H_疲労_01	Fatigued units suffer from reduced stats,\nso if a unit becomes fatigued, consider\nhaving them evacuate the battlefield.
MTUTID_H_疲労_02	To recover from fatigue, try eating food\nitems or offering provisions to a Mila Idol.
MTUTID_クラスチェンジ	Changing Classes
MTUTID_H_クラスチェンジ_00	Once a unit has reached a set level, they\nbecome eligible to promote to a new class.\nTo do so, visit a Mila Idol and choose the\n"Change Class" option from the menu.
MTUTID_アイテムを奪おう	Items
MTUTID_H_アイテムを奪おう_00	Simply holding an item will grant you the\nbenefit of its effects.
MTUTID_H_アイテムを奪おう_01	Some enemies carry their own items as well.\nDefeat them and claim the spoils!
MTUTID_号令	Tactics
MTUTID_H_号令_00	During battle, you can issue commands\nto allies who have yet to take action.
MTUTID_H_号令_01	Choose from among four available tactics\nto turn the tide of battle to your advantage!
MTUTID_Amiibo召喚	Using amiibo
MTUTID_H_Amiibo召喚_00	Alm and Celica can summon illusory soldiers\nusing amiibo to aid them in battle.
MTUTID_H_Amiibo召喚_01	The units summoned will change based on\nwhich amiibo is used. Try a variety!
MTUTID_ミラの歯車	Mila's Turnwheel
MTUTID_H_ミラの歯車_00	Mila's Turnwheel possesses the power to\nroll back time.
MTUTID_H_ミラの歯車_01	The number of available uses are restored\nonce a battle map is cleared.
MTUTID_長射程	Long-range Units
MTUTID_H_長射程_00	Going up against foes that can attack from\nlong-range places you at a disadvantage.
MTUTID_H_長射程_01	Approach these enemies with caution, or try\nbaiting them out with high-defense units.
MTUTID_扉	Doors
MTUTID_H_扉_00	To open a door, go around behind it\nand select the "Door" command.
MTUTID_魔法	Magic
MTUTID_H_魔法_00	Magical attacks ignore terrain effects.
MTUTID_特効	Damage Types
MTUTID_H_特効_00	Some types of attacks yield especially great\ndamage on the right type of foe. Holy\nattacks are feared by Terrors, for example,\nwhile bows are the nemesis of flying units.
MTUTID_戦技	Combat Arts
MTUTID_H_戦技_00	If you use an item long enough, you'll gain\naccess to special abilities hidden within it.
MTUTID_H_戦技_01	These combat arts allow you to perform\npowerful techniques at the cost of HP.

テーベの地下迷宮_C.txt
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ１_入口１_石碑	This is the Thabes Labyrinth.\n\nLet none set foot within its\ncursed halls.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ１_穴１_石碑	In Thabes lived an alchemist named\nForneus, much praised for his genius.\n\nIn time, he would be feared by all.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ２_行止１_石碑	Two matters consumed Forneus,\nand he spent his life in their pursuit.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ２_穴１_石碑	The first was how to wake the dead\nand control them as his army.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ３_穴１_石碑	The second was the creation of a\nsingular, perfect being.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ４_行止１_石碑	We senators sent forth messengers\nto Forneus. None returned.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ４_穴１_石碑	Next, the Council dispatched\nsoldiers. Still none returned.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ５_行止１_石碑	Thus, the Council chose to seal\nForneus's workshop with him\ninside it.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ５_門番１_石碑	The seal they used was made to last\nuntil the city crumbled to sand.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ５_穴１_石碑	Here lies sealed the workshop of\nthe demon alchemist Forneus.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ６_穴１_石碑	The critical component in the death\nmask is a particular shelled insect.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ７_行止１_石碑	I have come to call these marvels of\nnature thanatophages.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ７_穴１_石碑	Placed on a cadaver, thanatophages\nset down roots and assert control.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ８_穴１_石碑	At last, blood from a divine dragon!\nIts power is terrifying. Beautiful.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ９_行止１_石碑	The Senate has granted me all I need\nto craft life anew. I've succeeded.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ９_穴１_石碑	At first, it was a tiny thing. But on\nday 80, I gave it my blood. It grew.
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ１０_行止１_石碑	Its voice echoes in my head.\nDark thoughts. Violent th—
MID_C_迷路_テーベ_Ｂ１０_撃破後	$ZThe horror has passed.$k$pYet still a foul air lingers, filling this\nplace with a sense of dread...$k

後日談.txt
MID_AFT_DLCで死亡	Fell in battle and departed from\nthis world.
MID_AFT_汎用死亡	$aFinal resting place:\n$a0
MID_AFT_汎用死亡_レギュラー	Died shortly after the war due to\ngrievous wounds sustained in battle.\nThe world was darker for the loss.
MID_AFT_アルム	As first king of the One Kingdom of\nValentia, Alm spent his life restoring\nthe continent to glory. He would be\nremembered fondly by later\ngenerations as Saint-King Alm I,\nwho cast off the gods' oppressive\nyoke and founded a dynasty that\nwould last a thousand years.
MID_AFT_セリカ	In marrying Alm, Celica became the\nfirst queen of the One Kingdom of\nValentia, and aided her king with\nwisdom and compassion. Believed\nby the people to be a reincarnation\nof Mila, she was universally loved\nfor her work fostering peace within\nthe nascent kingdom.
MID_AFT_マイセン	As the One Kingdom's new\nchancellor—and right-hand man to\nKing Alm I—good Sir Mycen worked\ntirelessly toward the kingdom's\nrestoration. Despite his formal\nstanding and title, the king and\nqueen continued to love him like\na grandfather.
MID_AFT_ノーマ	After spearheading the unification\nof the Mila and Duma Faithful,\nNomah became the new sect's high\npriest. Despite being adored by a\ncongregation numbering in the\ntens of thousands, his friends attest\nthat he retained his playful,\nlighthearted nature all his life.
MID_AFT_ルカ	Lukas joined the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood of Knights, and after\nretiring, founded a school where he\ndevoted himself to his students'\neducation. His calm, intellectual\nmien won him many friends, and he\nnever longed for companionship\nthroughout the rest of his days.
MID_AFT_クリフ	With the war over, Kliff bid Alm\nfarewell and vanished—with some\nspeculating that he left for a new\ncontinent. Decades later, a young\nman claiming to be Kliff's son\narrived in Valentia to serve the king.\nThe boy was said to have a\ntremendous gift for magic.
MID_AFT_ロビン	As one of the most scrupulous\nknights in the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood, Tobin spent his life\nserving his friend King Alm.\nThe king, in turn, placed a great\ndeal of trust in Tobin, eventually\ngranting him both a title and his\nown castle.
MID_AFT_ロビン_1	Unable to move past Gray's death,\nTobin abruptly vanished before\nreappearing just as suddenly\nseveral years later. At King Alm's\nsuggestion, he joined the One\nKingdom's Brotherhood of Knights.\nThe talkative, playful Tobin of old,\nhowever, was gone forever.
MID_AFT_グレイ	As a member of the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood of Knights, Gray\nworked diligently at restoring the\ncontinent. He applied himself\nequally to winning Clair's heart, and\nbeat Tobin out in the end. As he\nwas heard to say, "Pick the guy with\nthe big heart, not the pretty face."
MID_AFT_グレイ_1	Devastated by Tobin's death, Gray\nwas nearly lost to the demon drink\nuntil Clair convinced him to clean\nup. After declining knighthoods in\nthe One Kingdom, the two married\nand lived out quiet lives. Gray was\nespecially fond of his son, whom he\nnamed after his friend.
MID_AFT_グレイ_2	Having lost the woman he loved,\nGray surprised even himself by\nembracing the life of a vagabond\nand setting off for parts unknown.\nHis friends spared no effort in\nattempting to track him down,\nbut it was to no avail.
MID_AFT_エフィ	Unable to get Alm out of her mind,\nFaye returned to her old life in\nRam Village. Eventually, she met\nand married a suitor who claimed\nhe did not mind her pining for the\nking, though her habit of vanishing\nwithout notice for days at a time\ncontinued to worry her new family.
MID_AFT_クレア	As a knight of the One Kingdom,\nClair worked hard on behalf of the\ncontinent. In time, Gray's tenacity\nwon her over, and she became his\nwife and then a mother. But Clair\nnever stayed grounded—she and\nher pegasus continued to race\nacross the sky, gawkers be damned.
MID_AFT_クレア_1	Gray's death left Clair feeling\nbetrayed and alone, but she joined\nthe knights of the One Kingdom and\ncontributed greatly to their growth.\nThe people were enamored with\nher melancholy beauty, which was\na splash of color amidst the mostly\ndour men of the Brotherhood.
MID_AFT_クレーベ	Clive was appointed the first\ncaptain of the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood of Knights. His talent\nand honesty made him popular with\ncommoners and nobles alike, and\nunder his leadership, the knights\nflourished. He and his lovely wife\nwere objects of the people's envy.
MID_AFT_クレーベ_1	His heart still heavy from the loss\nof Mathilda, Clive was appointed\ncaptain of the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood of Knights. A few\nshort years later, he was killed in a\nskirmish with pirates. The people\ngrieved deeply over the young loss\nof so fine a knight.
MID_AFT_フォルス	Forsyth joined the One Kingdom's\nknights after the war, working hard\nto bring order back to the land.\nTime took off some of his more\ncaustic edges, and he served many\nyears alongside Clive as a poised\nand thoughtful lieutenant.
MID_AFT_フォルス_1	Forsyth joined the One Kingdom's\nknights after the war, and he lived\nhis life for them as the late Clive\nwould have wanted. Time took off\nsome of Forsyth's more caustic\nedges, giving him a poised and\nthoughtful demeanor that reminded\nmany of his old commander.
MID_AFT_フォルス_2	Forsyth joined the One Kingdom's\nknights after the war. The loss of\nPython left him empty, which is\nperhaps why he volunteered to go\nto the borderlands to bring the\nking's peace. He met and wed a\nwoman from the area, and the two\nnever returned to the capital.
MID_AFT_パイソン	While the One Kingdom offered him\na knighthood, Python chose a\nquieter life as head of a frontier\nmilitia that defended villages and\ntowns from brigands. His old\nfriend would visit now and then,\noften with a bottle the two would\nuse to wile the night away.
MID_AFT_パイソン_1	Python accepted a knighthood from\nthe One Kingdom, growing into a\nnew man who worked diligently—\nalmost as if possessed by Forsyth.\nSadly, he died a few short years\nlater while fighting to suppress a\nrebellion, his wounds claiming him\nwhile he was far too young.
MID_AFT_メイ	Mae returned to Novis and resumed\nher work at the priory with Boey.\nThe two bickered endlessly before—\nand after—their wedding, while\nmanaging to raise many children\nduring the pauses between barbs.\nBoth of them often remarked that\nthey couldn't possibly be happier.
MID_AFT_メイ_1	After the loss of her verbal sparring\npartner, Boey, Mae fell into a deep\ndepression—but the encouragement\nof her friends eventually helped\nlight return to her life. She spent\nher days helping others at the\npriory, where she was beloved for\nher kindness and wicked humor.
MID_AFT_シルク	The war left Valentia with many\nwounded, and Silque traveled to\nthe former Rigel to heal all that she\ncould. Her exact path is difficult to\nretrace, but anecdotes survive\nacross the continent telling of the\ncountless lives she saved.
MID_AFT_ジェニー	After falling in a most unlikely love,\nGenny wed a man no one would ever\nexpect. As for whom she married,\nexactly, no one can say—whenever\nher friends asked, she replied only\nwith a smile and an enigmatic laugh.
MID_AFT_ボーイ	After returning to the priory on\nNovis, Boey weathered a trying\ncourtship with Mae until the two\nwere wed. Children came soon and\nin plentiful number, giving the pair\na host of new excuses to argue.\nJoy takes curious forms at times,\nbut Boey was a happy man indeed.
MID_AFT_ボーイ_1	Only after losing Mae did Boey\nrealize the nature and intensity of\nhis feelings for her. Wracked with\nregret, he poured himself into his\nwork, ultimately succeeding Nomah\nas high priest of the priory. He\nspent his life there aiding the poor\nin humble—yet rewarding—service.
MID_AFT_コンラート	Post-war, Conrad put down his\nlance and took up a quill, beginning\na long career as a civil servant.\nFollowing Mycen's retirement, he\nbecame chancellor, shepherding\nValentia's prosperity for years.\nDespite an endless chain of suitors,\nhe remained single all his life.
MID_AFT_カムイ	Intrigued by Jesse's idea, Kamui\nhelped to found a kingdom of\nmercenaries, and lived there happily\nfor a time. In the end, however,\nhis wanderlust prevailed—one day\nhe went for a stroll and simply\nvanished, never to be seen again.
MID_AFT_カムイ_1	Kamui established a new kingdom\nof, and for, mercenaries in what was\nonce Grieth's territory. Relations\nwith Valentia were favorable, with\nKamui often aiding the king in times\nof need. In later life, his efforts\nearned him fame and respect as\n"the Steel Amidst the Sand."
MID_AFT_レオ	Welcomed into the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood of Knights, Leon\nremained at Valbar's side until an\ninjury ended his fighting career.\nHe then took up work as a merchant\nin the city market, where he lived\nfree, happy, and dauntlessly true\nto himself to the last.
MID_AFT_レオ_1	Dealt a grievous blow by Valbar's\ndeath, Leon disappeared for a time\nbefore returning to join the One\nKingdom's Brotherhood of Knights.\nThere, he fought with the strength\nof a hundred men, and later served\nas an instructor to new recruits,\ncontributing greatly to the order.
MID_AFT_バルボ	Valbar joined the One Kingdom's\nBrotherhood of Knights at Alm's\nrequest, where he worked to train\nthe next generation. Well-loved\nfor his open and honest nature,\nhe spent his years happily\nsurrounded by friends and admirers.
MID_AFT_マチルダ	Mathilda cast her armor aside and\nwed Clive. She was rarely seen in\npublic after that, having perhaps\nchosen to support her husband\nbehind the scenes instead.\nHowever, her legendary exploits as\na knight are sure to live on forever\nin Valentian history.
MID_AFT_マチルダ_1	Clive's death forced Mathilda to\ncarry on in his place as captain of\nthe One Kingdom's Brotherhood\nof Knights. The grief in her heart\nsteeled her, and she became a key\nfigure in the kingdom's growth. Her\nlegendary exploits are sure to live\non forever in Valentian history.
MID_AFT_アトラス	After returning to the mountain\nhome where his brothers waited,\nAtlas resumed life as a lumberjack—\nthough his work defending the\nvillage from bandits continued to\nwin him admiration. While retired\nfrom the army, he was always first\nto aid the queen in times of need.
MID_AFT_ジェシー	After successfully founding a\nmercenary kingdom in Grieth's\nformer land, Jesse then proved\nsuccessful at ruling it. In times of\nstrife, he worked with Alm to secure\npeace. Tales of his valor are told\neven now, in which he's reverentially\ncalled "the Steel Amidst the Sand."
MID_AFT_ソニア	Sonya's search for a cure for\nwomen turned into witches took her\nacross the land. Her trail ended in\na remote region, after which she\nwas never seen again. Rumors fly,\nhowever, that shortly thereafter a\nnew witch took up residence in\nNuibaba's abode on Fear Mountain.
MID_AFT_ディーン	Shortly after the war, Deen\nvanished without a trace, along with\nthe Brave Sword. No record exists\nof his whereabouts thereafter.
MID_AFT_セーバー	Along with Jesse, Saber helped\nbuild the foundation for a new\nkingdom of, and for, mercenaries.\nHe continued working as a sellsword\nfor years to come and aided the\nOne Kingdom on many occasions—\nalways with his stunning bride by\nhis side.
MID_AFT_セーバー_1	Along with his stunning bride, Saber\ntoiled to rebuild Valentia. Though\nhe never officially enlisted as a\nknight, he put his mercenary skills\nand experience to work traveling\nthe land and mediating local\nstruggles—either with a fist of steel\nor a pint of ale.
MID_AFT_リュート	Painfully aware of the inadequacy\nof his magic, Luthier journeyed\nacross the sea. What he did there is\nunclear, but stories tell of a steady\nstream of angry ruffians who later\ncame to Valentia with a bone to\npick with an eccentric mage...
MID_AFT_デューテ	After the war, Delthea decided to\nlock away her magic and pursue a\nwild and happy life as an ordinary\nwoman. She found herself the\nperfect husband at court, but made\na point to return to her village\noften, where she would liven things\nup with tales of her brother.
MID_AFT_ティータ	Tatiana prayed that Zeke's memory\nwould remain hazy, and the two\neventually did live something of a\nhappy life. Though they were parted\nat times, Zeke always returned to\nTatiana's side in the end.
MID_AFT_ティータ_1	Her true love lost, Tatiana holed\nup in her priory and devoted herself\nto prayer. One old friend could not\nbear to see her alone in such a way,\nand he made it a point to woo her.\nEventually, his efforts overcame her\ngrief, and they were wed.
MID_AFT_カチュア	Having rescued Est as planned,\nCatria returned home in triumph.\nTales of her further exploits line the\npages of Archanea's history books.
MID_AFT_カチュア_1	Though painful loss hung over her\nreturn home like a dark cloud,\nthe annals of Archanean history\nare replete with tales of Catria's\nglorious exploits later in life.
MID_AFT_パオラ	Having rescued Est as planned,\nPalla returned home in triumph.\nTales of her further exploits line the\npages of Archanea's history books.
MID_AFT_パオラ_1	Though painful loss hung over her\nreturn home like a dark cloud,\nthe annals of Archanean history\nare replete with tales of Palla's\nglorious exploits later in life.
MID_AFT_エスト	Successfully reunited with her\nsisters, Est returned home in\ntriumph. Tales of her further\nexploits line the pages of\nArchanea's history books.
MID_AFT_エスト_1	Though painful loss hung over her\nreturn home like a dark cloud,\nthe annals of Archanean history\nare replete with tales of Est's\nglorious exploits later in life.
MID_AFT_ジーク	The fires of war had illuminated\nthe dark recesses of Zeke's\nmemory. But he loved Tatiana\ntoo much to burden her with his\ntortuous past, so he chose to\nbear it in silence as they lived out\ntheir lives together.
MID_AFT_ジーク_1	The loss of Tatiana, the woman\nwho had loved him deeply and\nunconditionally, shook Zeke with\ngrief. He abruptly vanished from\nValentia shortly after the war\nended, and while some claim to\nhave sighted him in Archanea, none\nof those sightings were confirmed.
